about.title: About ShopHub
about.subtitle: Your ultimate e-commerce destination where quality meets convenience. We're passionate about bringing you the best products with an exceptional shopping experience.
about.missionDescription: At ShopHub, we believe shopping should be effortless, enjoyable, and reliable. Our mission is to connect customers with high-quality products while providing outstanding service that exceeds expectations.
about.missionSecondary: We curate our product selection carefully, ensuring that every item meets our strict quality standards. From the latest tech gadgets to fashion essentials, we've got everything you need in one convenient place.
about.qualityFirstDescription: We never compromise on quality. Every product is carefully vetted to ensure it meets our high standards.
about.customerFocusedDescription: Your satisfaction is our priority. We're here to help and ensure you have the best shopping experience.
about.innovationDescription: We continuously evolve our platform to provide you with the latest features and best technology.
about.storyDescription: Founded in 2024, ShopHub started with a simple vision: to create an e-commerce platform that truly puts customers first. What began as a small startup has grown into a trusted destination for thousands of shoppers worldwide.
about.storySecondary: Our team of passionate developers, designers, and customer service specialists work tirelessly to ensure that every aspect of your shopping experience is smooth, secure, and satisfying.
about.joinCommunityDescription: Be part of our growing community of satisfied customers. Follow us for updates, special offers, and the latest product launches.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, our team is here to help you every step of the way.
contact.emailSupportDescription: Get in touch via email for detailed inquiries
contact.phoneSupportDescription: Speak directly with our support team
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.faqDescription: Looking for quick answers? Check out our FAQ section for common questions about orders, shipping, returns, and more.
contact.readyToShopDescription: Don't have a question but want to explore our products? Browse our extensive catalog and find exactly what you're looking for.

auth.signInSubtitle: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.
